personal.name: Ronan Ramos Sibunga
personal.title: Web and Mobile Developer - Javascript | ReactJS | React Native
personal.summary: Fullstack developer specializing in React, React Native, Node.js, and MongoDB. Passionate about building scalable apps, solving complex problems, and learning new technologies.
personal.aboutMe: I am a results-driven Fullstack Developer with extensive experience in building web and mobile applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. I focus on creating scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly solutions, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, and continuously improving technical skills. I enjoy mentoring peers and contributing to team success while delivering high-quality software solutions.

experience.description: Develop and maintain web and mobile applications using React, React Native, and Node.js, implementing scalable solutions and enhancing user experience.
Led front-end development and collaborated on cross-functional projects, delivering robust React applications and mobile solutions while mentoring junior developers.
Built end-to-end web and mobile solutions with React Native and Node.js, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and ensuring responsiveness across platforms.
Maintained and improved web and mobile applications, implemented state management with MobX, and enhanced overall user experience and application performance.
Delivered responsive web and mobile applications for various clients, leveraging modern JavaScript frameworks, state management solutions, and UI/UX best practices.
